code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router";import{blogList}from"../../config/data";import Chip from"../../components/common/Chip";import EmptyList from"../../components/common/EmptyList";import"./styles.css";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blog=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[blog,setBlog]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{let blog=blogList.find(blog=>blog.id===parseInt(id));if(blog){setBlog(blog);}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{className:"blog-goBack",to:"/",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:" \u2190"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Go Back"})]}),blog?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-wrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"blog-date",children:["Published ",blog.createdAt]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-subCategory",children:blog.subCategory.map((category,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chip,{label:category})},i))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:blog.cover,alt:"cover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"blog-desc",children:blog.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"blog-desc",children:blog.SecondPara}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"blog-desc",children:blog.ThirdPara})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EmptyList,{})]});};export default Blog;
